description_it: Classica insalata americana con sedano rapa, mele, noci e una cremosa salsa allo yogurt e maionese.
description_en: Classic American salad with celeriac, apples, walnuts, and a creamy yogurt-mayo dressing.

steps.instruction_it: Sbucciare il sedano rapa, lavarlo e tagliarlo a julienne. Scottarlo in acqua bollente salata per 2-3 minuti, scolarlo e tamponarlo.
steps.instruction_en: Peel the celeriac, wash and cut into julienne. Blanch in boiling salted water for 2-3 minutes, drain and pat dry.

steps.instruction_it: Preparare il condimento: unire yogurt greco, maionese, miele, succo di limone, sale e pepe bianco. Mescolare con una frusta.
steps.instruction_en: Prepare the dressing: combine Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, honey, lemon juice, salt and white pepper. Whisk together.

steps.instruction_it: Sbucciare le mele, togliere il torsolo e tagliarle a julienne. Metterle in acqua e limone per evitare che anneriscano.
steps.instruction_en: Peel the apples, core and cut into julienne. Place in lemon water to prevent browning.

steps.instruction_it: Tritare grossolanamente le noci. Unire sedano rapa, mele e condimento in una ciotola capiente.
steps.instruction_en: Roughly chop the walnuts. Combine celeriac, apples and dressing in a large bowl.

steps.instruction_it: Mescolare bene, aggiustare di sale e pepe, aggiungere le noci e servire.
steps.instruction_en: Mix well, adjust salt and pepper, add walnuts and serve.
